moves.name: Dire Hit All +
moves.effect: Sharply raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Unbreakable Bonds!
moves.effect: The lower the user’s HP is, the more this move increases the move gauges and raises the Attack of all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.effect: The user also takes 25% of the damage it dealt to the target.

passives.name: Pass It On
passives.description: Transfers half the amount of this sync pair’s raised stats to the sync pair that will switch in when this sync pair faints.

passives.name: Vigilance
passives.description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.
